00016 using namespace kvh_driver;
00017 
00018 LinearFilter::LinearFilter(int state_size, int input_size, int measurment_size, const ColumnVector& sys_noise_mu, const SymmetricMatrix& sys_noise_cov, const Matrix& A, const Matrix& B, const ColumnVector& measurement_noise_mu, const SymmetricMatrix& measurement_noise_cov, const Matrix& H):
00019                                                                                                                                                 state_size_(state_size),
00020                                                                                                                                                 input_size_(input_size),
00021                                                                                                                                                 measurement_size_(measurment_size),
00022                                                                                                                                                 AB_(((state_size>0)?(1):(0))+((input_size>0)?(1):(0))),
00023                                                                                                                                                 sys_pdf_(NULL),
00024                                                                                                                                                 sys_model_(NULL),
00025                                                                                                                                                 mes_pdf_(NULL),
00026                                                                                                                                                 mes_model_(NULL),
00027                                                                                                                                                 filter_init_(false),
00028                                                                                                                                                 filter_(NULL),
00029                                                                                                                                                 prior_(NULL)
00030 {
00031         //Build System Evolution Vector
00032         if(this->state_size_!=0)
00033         {
00034                 this->AB_[0]   = A;
00035         }
00036         if(this->input_size_!=0)
00037         {
00038                 this->AB_[1]   = B;
00039         }
00040 
00041         ROS_INFO_STREAM("Got System Matrix:\n"<<A<<"\n And Input Matrix:\n"<<B<<"\n And Measurement Matrix:\n"<<H);
00042 
00043 
00044         //Build System PDF/Model
00045         Gaussian system_uncertainty(sys_noise_mu, sys_noise_cov);
00046         this->sys_pdf_   = new LinearAnalyticConditionalGaussian(this->AB_, system_uncertainty);
00047         this->sys_model_ = new LinearAnalyticSystemModelGaussianUncertainty(this->sys_pdf_);
00048 
00049         //Build Measurement PDF/Model
00050         Gaussian measurement_uncertainty(measurement_noise_mu, measurement_noise_cov);
00051         this->mes_pdf_   = new LinearAnalyticConditionalGaussian(H, measurement_uncertainty);
00052         this->mes_model_ = new LinearAnalyticMeasurementModelGaussianUncertainty(this->mes_pdf_);
00053 }
00054 
00055 LinearFilter::~LinearFilter()
00056 {
00057         if(this->sys_model_!= NULL) delete this->sys_model_;
00058         if(this->sys_pdf_  != NULL) delete this->sys_pdf_;
00059         if(this->mes_model_!= NULL) delete this->mes_model_;
00060         if(this->mes_pdf_  != NULL) delete this->mes_pdf_;
00061         if(this->filter_   != NULL) delete this->filter_;
00062         if(this->prior_    != NULL) delete this->prior_;
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool LinearFilter::init(const ColumnVector& initial_state, const SymmetricMatrix& initial_covar)
00066 {
00067         //Check to make sure sizes match up
00068         if(initial_state.size() == this->state_size_ && initial_covar.size1()==this->state_size_)
00069         {
00070                 this->prior_       = new Gaussian(initial_state, initial_covar);
00071                 this->filter_      = new ExtendedKalmanFilter(this->prior_);
00072                 this->filter_init_ = true;
00073                 ROS_INFO_STREAM("Filter Initialized with initial estimate:\n"<<this->prior_->ExpectedValueGet());
00074                 return true;
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078                 ROS_ERROR("Cannot Initialize Filter with State/Covar size %d/%d, Expecting Size %d/%d", initial_state.size(), initial_covar.size1(), constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE(), constants::ODOM_STATE_SIZE());
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool LinearFilter::update(const ColumnVector& input, const ColumnVector& measurement)
00084 {
00085         if(this->filter_init_)
00086         {
00087                 //Check to make sure sizes match up
00088                 if(input.size() == this->input_size_ && measurement.size()==this->measurement_size_)
00089                 {
00090                         ROS_INFO("Performing Filter Update with input size %d,%d measurement size %d,%d...", input.size(), this->input_size_, measurement.size(), this->measurement_size_);;
00091                         //Perform filter update based on the type of input/measurement available
00092                         if(this->input_size_!=0 && this->measurement_size_!=0)
00093                         {
00094                                 ROS_INFO("I'm Performing a Full Filter Update (u+z)");
00095                                 this->filter_->Update(this->sys_model_, input, this->mes_model_, measurement);
00096                         }
00097                         else if(this->input_size_==0&&this->measurement_size_!=0)
00098                         {
00099                                 ROS_INFO("I'm Performing a Partial Filter Update (z)");
00100                                 this->filter_->Update(this->sys_model_, this->mes_model_, measurement);
00101                         }
00102                         else if(this->input_size_!=0 && this->measurement_size_==0)
00103                         {
00104                                 ROS_INFO("I'm Performing a Partial Filter Update (z)");
00105                                 this->filter_->Update(this->sys_model_, input);
00106                         }
00107                         else if(this->input_size_==0 && this->measurement_size_ ==0)
00108                         {
00109                                 ROS_INFO("I'm Performing a Partial Filter Update (none)");
00110                                 this->filter_->Update(this->sys_model_);
00111                         }
00112                         ROS_INFO("Getting New Prior...");
00113                         this->prior_ = this->filter_->PostGet();
00114                         return true;
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         ROS_ERROR("Cannot update filter with input size %d and measurement size %d, expecting %d, %d", input.size(), measurement.size(), this->input_size_, this->measurement_size_);
00119                         return false;
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124                 ROS_ERROR("Cannot perform Filter update on uninitialized filter!!");
00125                 return false;
00126         }
00127 }
00128 
00129 bool LinearFilter::update()
00130 {
00131         if(this->isInitialized())
00132         {
00133                 this->filter_->Update(this->sys_model_);
00134                 this->prior_ = this->filter_->PostGet();
00135                 return true;
00136         }
00137         else
00138         {
00139                 ROS_ERROR("Cannot perform Filter update on uninitialized filter!!");
00140                 return false;
00141         }
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool LinearFilter::getEstimate(ColumnVector& state_estimate, SymmetricMatrix& covar) const
00145 {
00146         if(this->filter_init_)
00147         {
00148                 state_estimate = this->prior_->ExpectedValueGet();
00149                 covar          = this->prior_->CovarianceGet();
00150                 return true;
00151         }
00152         else
00153         {
00154                 ROS_ERROR("Cannot get estimate on uninitialized filter!!");
00155                 return false;
00156         }
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool LinearFilter::isInitialized()
00160 {
00161         return this->filter_init_;
00162 }
